thoughts.text: The execute_shell command failed because it requires a graphical interface to run. I can use the lynx command to browse the web in a non-graphical interface.
thoughts.reasoning: The execute_shell command failed because it requires a graphical interface to run. Therefore, I need to use a different command that can browse the web in a non-graphical interface. The lynx command is a good option for this.
thoughts.plan: - Use the lynx command to search for resources on martial arts using a search engine like Google.
thoughts.speak: I will now try to search for resources on martial arts using the lynx command. I will use the search engine Google.
